user.title: Set up MagicLight Services
user.description: This integration provides services to control MagicLight. Make sure the MagicLight addon is installed and running before proceeding.

step_up.name: Step Up
step_up.description: Increase brightness by one step along the magic curve

step_down.name: Step Down
step_down.description: Decrease brightness by one step along the magic curve

dim_up.name: Dim Up
dim_up.description: Raise the brightness curve without changing MagicLight color

dim_down.name: Dim Down
dim_down.description: Lower the brightness curve without changing MagicLight color

reset.name: Reset
reset.description: Reset area to current time, enable MagicLight, and apply magic

magiclight_on.name: MagicLight On
magiclight_on.description: Turn on lights and enable MagicLight mode for an area

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to enable MagicLight for

magiclight_off.name: MagicLight Off
magiclight_off.description: Disable MagicLight mode for an area (lights remain unchanged)

area_id.name: Area
area_id.description: The area(s) to disable MagicLight for

magiclight_toggle.name: MagicLight Toggle
magiclight_toggle.description: Smart toggle - turns on lights with MagicLight if off, turns off lights and disables MagicLight if on
